p:
VCF files for the PPMI samples, generated by Project 188, were downloaded from the PPMI website ( www.ppmi-info.org/data). SNPs with a minor allele frequency greater than 0.001 located in 250 kb on either side of the 81 SVA RIPs were extracted and PLINK (v1.07) was used to identify those SNPs in strong LD with the RIPs ( r 2 > 0.8). For each SVA RIP the SNP in strongest LD was selected and searched for in the summary statistics from Nalls et al.
6 to determine if this proxy SNP for the SVA RIP genotype was associated with PD risk.
